'''1.9''' (originally released as '''1.8.3''') is a [[Java Edition Classic]] server version that released with [[Classic 0.28|0.28]] on October 27, 2009.<ref>[[wordofnotch:224775024|"The skinny on the creative mode update"]] – The Word of Notch, October 27, 2009</ref>

This version was originally released as "1.8.3" (as labeled in the <samp>README</samp>), but the <samp>README</samp> for [[Java Edition Classic server 1.9.1|the next version]] retcons this label to "1.9".<ref name="README"/>.

== Additions ==
* Added server support for all features added in [[Java Edition Classic 0.28|0.28]].
* Added support for survival multiplayer.
** Still a work in progress, and was not publicly available on the website.
** Was very buggy at this time.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed exploit where someone logging in with an illegal name would cause players to disconnect.<ref name="README"/>
